resources.string: After changing any of these values, you need to restart the app. Use the back key to exit and make sure the connectivity notification icon has disappeared before launching again.
Stay synchronized to blockchain in background while connected to power.
Hostname of single peer to connect to. Regular peer discovery will be skipped. Need to restart app to take effect.
Reset blockchain, transactions and wallet balance. Use only when being instructed.
Would you like to reset and replay the blockchain?\n\nThis will temporary zero your wallet balance and remove transactions. Both will recover as blockchain sync progresses.
